# 水务行业数据智能化解决方案

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/shuiwu-xingye-shuju-zhinenghua-jiejuefangan
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/shuiwu-xingye-shuju-zhinenghua-jiejuefangan
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install shuiwu-xingye-shuju-zhinenghua-jiejuefangan
shuiwu-xingye-shuju-zhinenghua-jiejuefangan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g shuiwu-xingye-shuju-zhinenghua-jiejuefangan
shuiwu-xingye-shuju-zhinenghua-jiejuefangan <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
